newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says supports BOJ low interest rate policy.
newsitem.headline: MOF says supports BOJ low interest rate policy.

text.p: Japan's Ministry of Finance (MOF) fully supports the Bank of Japan's (BOJ) present monetary policy of keeping interest rates low, Finance Minister Hiroshi Mitsuzuka told reporters on Friday.
Mitsuzuka said the BOJ is carrying out the policy in order to support the economy and ensure its recovery.
"It is natural that we support what the BOJ governor has been saying," he said.
Mitsuzuka added that low rates were hard on pensioners and those dependent on interest rate payments, but said he wanted to ask such people to try to manage until the economy's recovery becomes firm.
